description:
_________________________________________________________________________

✓ Course Updated as of Sunday May 1st, 2016
✓ Teacher has more than 1,5K happy students.
✓ 100% Student questions solved. Also via Skype.
✓ Free access to my How to Create your Professional Email Course

_________________________________________________________________________

Students, just need a computer, an internet connection to get started.

100% Beginner-Friendly.

No matter where you are located, what your nationality or age is, you will get a vast knowledge and entire description on the process of how to create a beautiful, stable, and impressive professional website. It's 2015. Let's face it. No matter if you have a car shop or a multi million dollar cake-shop business, you need a website. There is no other way that people are going to find you.

In this course, I commit to teaching you how to:

  1. How to study this course.
  2. How to create your Wix account.
  3. How to find out how you want your website to look like
  4. Correctly identify the template that most fits your taste.
  5. Select and successfully save that template.
  6. Edit your website from all over the world. Easy.
  7. Spotlessly operate with links, images, and textfields.
  8. Edit the Heather and the Footer in optimized manner.
  9. Test your website
  10. Publish your website, under your very own domain.
  11. Integrate Google Analytics to track and learn about your users and clients.


The terminology utilized in this course is easy to understand for non-native english speakers, for the purpose of making the learning of this course possible for anyone who has a basic english level. There is no necessary previous experience for taking this course. You will learn absolutely everything necessary in this course, and you will earn a huge knowledge on how to create your very own and high-end professional website. As your teacher, I commit, to solving any doubt wherever it might appear. Please use this service at all times! It should take a couple of days, on an average, to effectively complete the course, since it's structured on easy-to-follow lectures put in a chronological order for the ease of learning. Make the most out of your free time. It will be a very easy beginning, and those who show enthusiasm and are constant on the course instructions, will feel very well compensated.

Ready for a change?
Get yourself a website.

Best,
Gonzalo
title: Create a Professional Website in a Day with WIX. [NO CODING]
